title: RP
body: i wonder..why dont we get 400 RP anymore.... :( ..why the chests instead...in the chests we get{{champion:22}}   and {{champion:86}} ... both are 450...isn't that a little..you know......cheap ?

replies.body: Per the [new player chest announcement](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp), the new player chests help new players with obtaining some new champs and get an introduction to hextech crafting among other things.  Hopefully, the chest can give some new players a few perks with what they find inside!  Hope that helps clear things up!

Well, the second chest gives you a random skin for a random champ you own plus 800 essence. I'd say it isn't that bad though generally speaking those 2 chests are for those who just started League so those 2 champs aren't horrible gifts (plus you get the ward and a skin for one of the 2).
